Contract Revenue, yet to be Earned MUST never be negative.

Contract Costs, Estimated Cost to Complete MUST never be negative.
wip:ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete
Billings in Excess of Costs and Estimated Earnings MUST never be negative.
wip:BillingsInExcessOfCostAndEarnings
Costs And Earnings In Excess Of Billings MUST never be negative.
wip:CostsAndEarningsInExcessOfBillings
Percentage complete computation is correct.
Percent Complete (={$PercentageComplete}) must match the formula 1 - [Estimated Costs to Complete (={$ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete}) / Estimated Costs (={$ContractCostsEstimatedCost})] = {xfi:format-number((if($ContractCostsEstimatedCost ne 0) then (1-($ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete div $ContractCostsEstimatedCost)) else 0),'#.00')} in Contract No. {//wip:ContractNumber[xfi:fact-dimension-s-equal2(.,$PercentageComplete,xs:QName('wip:ContractNumberAxis')) and xfi:period-end(xfi:period(.)) eq xfi:period-end(xfi:period($PercentageComplete))]}

Accounts receivable billed for long-term contracts or programs MUST never be negative.

Accounts receivable from retainage MUST never be negative.
